name: RPGPG
description:
RPGPG How to Play:

At the start of each turn, I roll 4 dice. Each number corresponds to an action that can be assigned to a hero:

ex: 1 is to move forward

Actions follow the order of the dice: the top die goes first, the second goes second, etc

Each hero has 2 special abilities: SPECIAL 1 and SPECIAL 2

  • Warrior (top) can CLEAVE (attack adjacent tiles) and COUNTER an incoming attack
  • Rouge (middle) can STEALTH (dodge attacks) and STAB (critical hit)
  • Mage (bottom) can CURSE (deal lingering damage) and HEAL the weakest party member

(I didn't have enough time to make a decent in-game tutorial, so this will have to do. Good luck!)
